product_name: ALPS Mountaineering Trail Star 250 Headlamp - Special Buy
long_description: With a powerful 250-lumens extending the length of nearly 2 football fields, this over-the-head lamp offers rock-solid stability for hands-free camp tasks or lowlight mountaineering adventures.
short_description: With a powerful 250-lumens extending the length of nearly 2 football fields, this over-the-head lamp offers rock-solid stability for hands-free camp tasks or lowlight mountaineering adventures.
